title: NBAmoji
description:
Welcome to the NBAmoji App – The official emoji app of the NBA!
The NBAmoji App offers hundreds of NBA and WNBA emojis, as well as special collections for NBA events, NBA Teams and more.
New emojis will continue to be made available throughout every NBA season.
You can share emojis across social media, messaging apps (where the copying and pasting of images and GIFS is supported) or install them as a keyboard on your device (see settings for instructions).
description_html:
Welcome to the NBAmoji App – The official emoji app of the NBA!

The NBAmoji App offers hundreds of NBA and WNBA emojis, as well as special collections for NBA events, NBA Teams and more.

New emojis will continue to be made available throughout every NBA season.

You can share emojis across social media, messaging apps (where the copying and pasting of images and GIFS is supported) or install them as a keyboard on your device (see settings for instructions).
